Sentencas: The dielectric relaxation behavior of the fluorite structured nanocrystalline Ce0.8Gd0.1Pr0.1O2-delta compound was studied in the temperature range of 200-550 degrees C. Two different types of relaxation processes were observed corresponding to (1) defect pairs such as (Pr-Ce(')-V-O)(center dot) and (Gd-Ce(')-V-O)(center dot) and (2) the trimers such as (Pr-Ce(')-V-O(center dot center dot)-Gd-Ce(')).
Titulo: Dielectric relaxation properties of nanostructured Ce0.8Gd0.1Pr0.1O2-δ material at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: The correlation between ionic conduction and the dielectric properties of the nanocrystalline material is discussed.
Titulo: Dielectric relaxation properties of nanostructured Ce0.8Gd0.1Pr0.1O2-δ material at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: Very low values of the migration energy and association energy of the oxygen vacancies are observed, which are 0.42 and 0.03 eV, respectively.
Titulo: Dielectric relaxation properties of nanostructured Ce0.8Gd0.1Pr0.1O2-δ material at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: The obtained value of association energy agrees well with the theoretical prediction on doubly doped ceria.
Titulo: Dielectric relaxation properties of nanostructured Ce0.8Gd0.1Pr0.1O2-δ material at intermediate temperatures
